name: Azukiarai
shortLoreBlurb: Azukiarai is a spirit from Japan associated with river, bean-washing prank. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain. Stories teach caution through pranks that expose human folly.
description: Azukiarai is a spirit from Japan associated with river, bean-washing prank. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain. Stories teach caution through pranks that expose human folly.
